workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.4076413096409456 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.07618486013480363 --weight-decay 0.00035206748658187583 --lr 3.270754177042138e-05 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 128197 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.08523908020931346 --max-update 3500000 --max-epoch 15 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
